Html:
Hi ,

I am new here. Storm is the exactly what I have been looking for and I came to the right place. 

I have downloaded the source code and want to build the solution. But it is giving me this error code. I think it is for win32 icon. In my project properties it has the value " --standalone --win32res icon.res " in other flag property. By right shouldn't be any problem.

Can anyone please point me out? 

Thanks
Hello, I'm getting this error too.  Did you ever get it figured out?  This is a great tool, but doesn't seem to be an active project anymore.
